bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Telegram from William Crawford Gorgas to Robert M. O'Reilly, May 11, 1905

div1.p: Gorgas lists yellow fever patients to date in the Panama Canal Zone.

div1.head: Telegram from William Crawford Gorgas to Robert M. O'Reilly, May 11, 1905
div1.opener:
Translation of cablegram received at 7:00 p. m.,
May 11th, 1905.
79 CO KE AH 50 GOVT PANAMA
ISTHMIAN,
div1.p:
T. C. Aubrey,
Gustave Newbury,
Mike Doty,
A. B. Bennors,
T. J. Butler,
H. Carrington,
N. M. Barrett,
A. Philpots.
Foregoing employed in the United States.

Charles Leask from the United States, employed installation
Ancon Hospital laundry.
div1.closer: GORGAS. COPY for the Surgeon General, U. S. Army.
